titleStmt.title: Newes from Vienna the 5. day of August. 1566. of the strong towne and castell of Tula in Hungary xi. myles beyond the riuer Danubius, which was cruelly assaulted by the great Turke, but nowe by Gods mighty working relieued, the sayd Turks marueilouslye discomfited and ouerthrowen. Translated out of hye Almaine into English, and printed in Augspurge by Hans Zimmerman.

publicationStmt.publisher: By John Awdeley, dwelling in litle Britaine streete without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Includes: "A prayer of thankesgeuyng, for the defence of the Christians agaynst the cruel Turke".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
